A cartoon series featuring a dog who learns to draw and uses his talent to help his friends solve problems.
A poetry collection featuring the thoughts and emotions of a dog who loves to draw.
A children's book that teaches kids about perseverance and following their dreams, using the story of a dog who learns to draw.
A documentary about the history and evolution of dog art, featuring interviews with famous dog artists and collectors.
A mobile app that allows users to create and share their own dog-inspired drawings, with a community of other dog art enthusiasts.
